remarks: Lemma for ~ psgnuni .  Any nonempty representation of the identity can be incrementally transformed into a representation two shorter. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
psgnunilem3.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnunilem3.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
psgnunilem3.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. V ) $.
psgnunilem3.w1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. Word T ) $.
psgnunilem3.l $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` W ) = L ) $.
psgnunilem3.w2 $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` W ) e. NN ) $.
psgnunilem3.w3 $e |- ( ph -> ( G gsum W ) = ( _I |` D ) ) $.
psgnunilem3.in $e |- ( ph -> -. E. x e. Word T ( ( # ` x ) = ( L - 2 ) /\ ( G gsum x ) = ( _I |` D ) ) ) $.
psgnunilem3 $p |- -. ph $.
$d D x $.
$d G x $.
$d L x $.
$d T x $.
$d W x $.
$d ph x $.
